body_html: @jhseu Thanks for the suggestion. The PR has been updated. Now config file for region (~/.aws/config) is only used if AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG is set, and the location of the config file could also be overwritten by AWS_CONFIG_FILE. Please take a look.
body_text: @jhseu Thanks for the suggestion. The PR has been updated. Now config file for region (~/.aws/config) is only used  if AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG is set, and the location of the config file could also be overwritten by AWS_CONFIG_FILE. Please take a look.
body: @jhseu Thanks for the suggestion. The PR has been updated. Now config file for region (`~/.aws/config`) is only used  if `AWS_SDK_LOAD_CONFIG` is set, and the location of the config file could also be overwritten by `AWS_CONFIG_FILE`. Please take a look.
